title: some bugs i found while testing out oc 5.0.6
body:
edit:
im running this on: vm - opensuse 12.1 + all required modules enabled
smb share with windows 7 prof
and using sqlite db

hey guys,

installed owncloud 5.0.6 now and did a couple tests to see if the features which would get me using owncloud as a productive system are working or not.

first problem occured while installing owncloud. i'm working with owncloud since 4.0.7 and already did like hundreds of installations so that i'd say, for me i think i'm ofc able to install it. the reason why i'm talking about this was an internal server error 500. i looked up all configuration files and settings but i didn't got this running.
i tried manuel installation and 1-click-installation on opensuse 12.1. i've no idea why, but after trying to install it manuel like 20 times it worked. already did a bugreport for that - reopened it because talked with someone in the irc webchat who ask me to reopen it because maybe it just looks like a single person error but it isn't. anyway for those who are interested in this installation issue more in detail check out: 
>> https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/3461

after getting owncloud installed i started doing a couple tests:
- smb-mount:
	- can't create files
	- after deleting a file the view don't get refreshed (but the file got deleted)
	- can't delete files

  log:
	warning	php	stat(): stat failed for smb://username:password@computername/smb/testfile at 
/srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/apps/files_external/lib/smb.php#65

	warning	php	filetype(): lstat failed for smb://username:password@computername/smb/testfile at 
/srv/www/htdocs/owncloud/apps/files_external/lib/streamwrapper.php#33

  this is one of the main featues i'd like on owncloud as far as it will ever work...i'm probably the most annoying "bugreporter" of this featue. if someone is able to fix   this, i please you to take a look here: >> https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2416
its a bugreport 2 month ago where a couple other people now talking about the 
same issues. hopeful this will get fixed somedays...

- when taking a look on error-logs i saw that passwords of the owncloud accounts still getting logged clearly. i mean is there no way to do this on another way? e.g. the       warning php above just showed my password clearly. its a really huge security bug in my opinion, i mean just think about sitting in your office clicking on the       administration someone enters and just can check your passwords ...

- sharing of local and smb mounted folders/files:
	- folders which should get shared get corrupt foldernames on the shared accounts. it looks like the folder name are like whitespace and caused by this if two folders getting shared u got like whitespace (2)
	- no write rights on shared folders doesn't matter if i checked just everything (full rights) or not.
	- doesn't show any files
- music app:
	- if clicking on a track, the label of the timeline gets shown first on a bad position i think (depening on your browser and scale of the windows, e.g. right on top of 	  the volume-symbol).
	- i dunno how to call this "bar" where the play/stop-buttons are, i'll call it headerbar - could get a little bit nicer. in my opinion this controls are out of position. putting them all on the same height would be nicer.
	- the library looks totally corrupted. there are no columnheaders but it seems like having 3 columns to be able to klick. the first one always showed me unknown. well 		  and what's meant with unknown? if i add the tracks to the list the right songnames are getting shown in the playlist on the left side. well i uploaded 3 default tracks of windows7 and i get one entry unknown like i said. adding 	  all 3 tracks to playlist works fine.

edit: if just giving other members access on mounted folders too its the same like on top: smb mount.

  log (translated on my own):
	[thu may 23 11:16:17 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] directory index forbidden by options directive: /srv/www/htdocs/
        ls: cannot access oc://admin/files/maid with the flaxen hair.mp3: file or directory not found
	ls: cannot access oc://admin/files/sleep away.mp3: file or directory not found
	ls: cannot access oc://admin/files/kalimba.mp3: file or directory not found
  
  original log:
	[thu may 23 11:16:17 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] directory index forbidden by options directive: /srv/www/htdocs/
	ls: cannot access oc://admin/files/maid with the flaxen hair.mp3: datei oder verzeichnis nicht gefunden
	ls: cannot access oc://admin/files/sleep away.mp3: datei oder verzeichnis nicht gefunden
	ls: cannot access oc://admin/files/kalimba.mp3: datei oder verzeichnis nicht gefunden

- contacts app:
	- it looks like the list who shows your contacts got 4 columns. again here, no column headers, and all columns are just empty. if i click sometimes nothing happens and sometimes the edit contact dialog popps up.
- calendar app:
	- if clicking on an event, just getting shown the name of the three tabs (info, repeat, share) of the following opening dialog were shown on the left side of the bottom. i think thy shouldn't been shown there too, right?

so far, i hope i could help out maybe finding a few unknown issues.
regards
yaerox
